name: CubeCramp
description:
Inspired by the indie game "Undertale", CubeCramp started development a year ago. In this lengthy process we have come up with many gameplay mechanics that feel fun and rewarding, as well as a quirky visual style that will make any player feel welcome!

We've already had a 640€+ Kickstarter, which can be found here.


Join our Discord and subscribe to the project to avoid missing any gameplay updates!

Subscribe to our Kickstarter and support our project!

We are including multiple endings or story paths, based on the dialogue and gameplay choices made by the player. The branching dialogue system is already set up!

Players will be able to experience different story paths in multiple playthroughs!

We'll mostly be working on 4 paths: Total Chaos, Neutral Chaos, Neutral Light and Total Light!

Player stories are a big part of CubeCramp, that's why we believe that reaching your Twitch audience via Twitch Integration would be awesome!

We plan on delivering unique events, Twitch chat changing gameplay and viewers showing up as unique NPCs!

It works, but it's still very early in development. However, it will be targeted for the next big update, and contributing to the project will surely help speed this up!

CubeCramp is bundled with a translation file that developers and fans can modify to translate the game with no applications other than the notepad. This way, translating becomes available for everyone, in a cheap and efficient way. This is reason we were able to translate the demo in as little as an hour. Not only translating, but also modding, creating your own dialogues becomes a feature.
